name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Grayscale Focus: Enhance Your Productivity with Monochrome Browsing

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn webpages black and white for productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Grayscale Focus helps you stay focused by transforming selected websites into grayscale. Reduce distractions and enhance your productivity with this simple extension.

KEY FEATURES:

Selective Grayscale: Add websites to your blacklist to view them in grayscale.

Persistent Settings: Your settings are saved, so websites remain in grayscale each time you visit.

User-Friendly Interface: Easily add or remove websites with a few clicks.
Enhanced Focus: Minimize visual clutter and stay on task.

HOW TO USE:

Add Websites: Enter the URL in the popup and click "Add" to blacklist it.
Manage: View and manage your blacklisted websites from the popup.
